Trinity::


"I want... I want... "cried Trinity "I want that they come back... I 
don't lost them... I don't like that they died like my mom and 
dad... "sob"I tried to be good... I didn't like give troubles... I 
just like that no body hurt them while I'm around... IT'S NOT 
FAIR!!!!"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded tapped Trinitys arm and looked at her with a smile. He was 
> not much bigger than she was...but alot wiser.
> "Your it kid..." he siad and tried to get her to chase him back to 
> base.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Nightlight/Windlord/Trinity::
> > 
> > "HEY!!!!" shouted Trinity when she felt that someone was grabbing 
> > her  "Let me go!!!! I want' to show that bully-bot to let be 
alone 
> my 
> > friends!!! I  don't want that no one wurt my friends!!!!!"
> >

> > 
> > 
> > WIndlord ran after them, Nightlight looked a second to Trinity 
and 
> > later she saw in the direction that Windlord took, as if she 
didn't 
> > know what to do... after several seconds she looked at Trinity 
> again

> >

> GIVE 
> > YOU MORE TROUBLES... i'LL BEHAVE...I DON'T LIKE LOST YOU LIKE MY 
> DAD 
> > AND MY MOM..."
